1370: Brun was born in Waale straet in 1370.
Got married to Clementia at age 20 in 1370.
1371: Had a son with Clementia, Kornillis, at age 21.
1373: Had a daughter with Clementia, Ermegardis, at age 23.
1375: Had a daughter with Clementia, Baua, at age 25.
1377: Had a son with Clementia, Kybben, at age 27.
1378: Had a son with Clementia, Gerrit, at age 28.
Lost son Gerrit when Gerrit was 1 years old.
1382: Had a daughter with Clementia, Siwa, at age 32.
1385: Lost son Kornillis when Kornillis was 15 years old.
